extendedInfo.description: Yonder is a location sharing plugin for Kik Messenger.0) make sure you have KiK messenger installed1) start Yonder using the '+' button in KiK (see screenshot)2) tap a point on the map3) press the KiK button4) in KiK, select a conversationYonder can also start the Google Maps app, for example to start travelling directions.The following permissions are used :- "fine (GPS) location" (to determine your location)- "full Internet access" (for google maps background)Yonder obviously requires Kik Messenger to be installed in order to send messages.

reviews.title: Easy and works very well, awesome!
reviews.comment: Very useful, easy to use, a nifty addition to Kik messenger. I hope someday there will be a whatsapp and viber version of Yonder as well!
reviews.author: Rogier E
